Content.Text:
<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here we are! Have fun playing with all the
animals.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm? It's a shoebill stork. What's wrong, Mr.
Shoebill?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It looks like he wants us to follow him. Let's go.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow! Look at all the animals that came! What
are they going to do?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's the first time I've ever seen an animal
dance like that.
<PAGE>
I believe they wanted to say thanks for making
the Safari such a fun place to be.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, look! You got a present from the animals.
I'm jealous! Be sure you make good use of it,
okay?
Yay! I got a Philosopher's Stone!
